summary: Comprehensive testing completed for TechTribe premium digital agency website. Backend API testing achieved 100% success (15/15 tests). Frontend testing confirmed all major features work including homepage sections, navigation, catalogue functionality, contact form, authentication, admin panel, and AI chatbot integration.

minor_fixes_applied.issue: Create Product endpoint returned 200 instead of 201
minor_fixes_applied.impact: Fixed - now returns proper 201 Created status

ui_bugs.issue: Chat toggle button not clickable due to Emergent badge overlay
ui_bugs.workaround: Force click works, but normal click is blocked

design_feedback.feedback: Excellent dark premium theme with proper Azerbaijani content. Professional layout with good contrast and spacing.

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section and all required sections (Why TechTribe, How We Work, Tech Stack, Featured Products, CTA)
Navigation works: Home, About, Catalogue, Contact, Auth
Catalogue page loads with 6+ demo products
Category filtering (Biznes, E-Ticar…ôt, etc.) works
Search functionality on catalogue page works
Product detail page navigation works
Contact form submission works (POST /api/contact)
Auth page with login/register tabs works
Admin login with admin@techtribe.az / admin123 successful
Admin dashboard shows correct stats (products, messages, chats)
Backend API: GET /api/catalogue returns 6 items
Backend API: POST /api/auth/register and login work
Backend API: POST /api/contact saves message (email_sent: false as expected)
Backend API: GET /api/dashboard/stats returns stats
Backend API: Full CRUD operations work
AI Chat widget integration with Claude Sonnet 4.5 works
Footer visible with proper Azerbaijani text
All text content in Azerbaijani language
Dark premium theme implemented correctly
Mobile responsive design works
6 demo catalogue items seeded successfully

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (1 minor overlay issue with chat widget)

action_item_for_main_agent.chat_widget_overlay_fix: Chat widget button has z-index issue with Emergent badge overlay. Need to increase z-index of chat widget or adjust positioning to avoid overlay conflicts.
